recipe.title: Fennel Cucumber Relish
ingredients: 1 pound fennel bulb (sometimes called anise), stalks discarded and bulb finely chopped
1 pound seedless cucumbers (see cooks' note, below), halved lengthwise, cored, and cut into 1/4-inch dice
6 tablespoons cider vinegar, or to taste
instructions: Stir together all ingredients in a bowl and let stand 15 minutes.
